content: lion brand pattern # 80460ad *this lovely half-moon or circle shawl is an elegant statement lion brand yarn * skill level easy + vanna s glamour® article #861 5 balls crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm worked in 49-row pattern finish with edging available in different colorways 80460ad lavish lace shawl 1 861-134 copper corrections applied jan 17 2013 80871ad emily shawl 2 861-170 topaz corrections applied jan 17 2013 search for other lion brand half moon crochet shawl patterns 3 on ravelry 1 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-lavish-lace-shawl-1 2 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-emily-shawl-1 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/search#craft=crochet&query=half%20moon&page=1&website=lionbrand com&sort=name&popcorn=shawl-wrap&view=captioned_thumbs
